SELECT SILAGE_CODE , SELLER_CODE , ID , ENROLL_DATETIME , PRODUCTION_DATE , WEIGHT , COUNT , UNIT_PRICE , TRANSACTION_STATUS FROM SILAGE INNER JOIN MEMBER ON SILAGE.SELLER_CODE = MEMBER.MEMBER_CODE
AND SILAGE_CODE=#{silageCode}
AND SELLER_CODE=#{sellerCode}
ORDER BY UNIT_PRICE
ORDER BY UNIT_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY COUNT
ORDER BY COUNT DESC
